editorialSummary.text: 160,000-sq.ft. tennis center featuring indoor & outdoor courts for lessons, leagues & camps.

originalText.text:
One of the best facilities I have played and been to.

This is definitely the best facility I have played in and it is now my regular place. It is easy to get to and the entire experience is seamless and very worth the cost.

I was very pleased with the ambience and overall make-up of the facility.  They have 14-har-tru courts and 16-hard courts that are extremely well-maintained and well lit. They have both indoor and outdoor courts (depending on the season); inclement weather is not an issue—provided they have availability.

We wanted to play on hard court, but were accidently booked on a clay court, but the front desk was very accommodating and were able to provide us with a hard court without any issues! They made us feel invited and made the experience a lot more comfortable. On another occasion, I was able to take a lesson from one of the pros, and was impressed with the knowledge and understanding of my game. I was able to pick-up a few new things that definitely helped my game!

The staff is present and caring for any of your tennis needs—whether they be private lessons, junior/adult programs, leagues, and now, pickle-ball!

They also have a fully-stocked pro-shop that provides a quick turnaround for stringing and other equipment needs, and their café also adds a nice touch to the experience!

I highly recommend this facility for all your tennis needs for all ages and levels.

originalText.text:
My sons came for a 2 week camp and we are very happy with the academy. The coaches Ion, Santos, Lorik and Ken especially were thoroughly professional and helpful at all times.

The cafeteria staff was very friendly and the food though unhealthy for a tennis academy, was tasty! Typical American fare. They should offer healthy options for both students and those who walk in alike.

AJ, the new person in charge has a lot of enthusiasm and is very cheerful :) hoping to come back again next year!

originalText.text: Worked here for many years and I went back recently  to hit some balls and the new staff was friendly , loved the experience as a customer now

authorAttribution.displayName: Jorge Pablo Lerdo de Tejada West

originalText.text:
It’s a privilege to play @ John McEnroe Tennis Academy with my family!

Thank you John!  You are a true testament to tennis in the world.

text.text:
It’s a privilege to play @ John McEnroe Tennis Academy with my family!

Thank you John!  You are a true testament to tennis in the world.

originalText.text: Not sure what’s the deal that parents are not allowed at the court side watching their kids train, what’s the beef with that Argentinian Assistant kicking us out and confronting every single parent hanging around. Junior program is a joke, nothing more than having them babysitting a couple of hours each week.  A lot of parents were drawn here given the name associated with the academy, but don’t be fooled!
